items.sentence: I\'m looking forward to going to the zoo with you.
I\'m not sure what my children want for Christmas.
I\'m pretty sure Tom has already made up his mind.
Tom made it plain that he didn\'t want to do that.
Tom managed to put out the fire with Mary\'s help.
Tom called to say he couldn\'t attend the meeting.
Tom actually believed he could predict the future.
Tom advised Mary not to borrow money from anybody.
Tom always forgives Mary, no matter what she does.
Do you know any restaurants with good Korean food?
Later that night, Tom told Mary what had happened.
Tom said that he had eaten lunch with his friends.
Tom said there was something we had to talk about.
I think it\'s time for me to give her a ride home.
I think you\'ve got me confused with someone else.
Our profits have declined over the past few years.
People used to think that tomatoes were poisonous.
Perhaps Tom has already talked to Mary about that.
Please be sure to take one dose three times a day.
Students aren\'t allowed in the teachers\' lounge.
